title: Duniyadari: Watch trailer: 'Dunyadari' is a fun youthful film with a retro touch - Times of India

persons.name: shital shah of hu tu tu

text:
It���s a happy feeling for the makers of upcoming Gujarati movie 'Duniyadari' whose first look has and trailer has been unveiled yesterday, also out on social media. The film, currently in its post-production stage, went on floors in end of September and has been extensively shot in Ahmedabad keeping the film���s retro look and feel in-mind just like the original Marathi flick.
It's a wrap for the makers of 'Duniyadari' The shooting of the much-awaited Gujarati film 'Duniyadari' (a remake of the hit Marathi film with the same title), which went on floors towards the end of September, has just got completed.
The film is directed by Shital Shah of Hu Tu Tu movie fame and has Monty Sharma as music composer. Actors Malhar Thakar and Esha Kansara playing leads role, while Aarjav Trivedi, Mamta Chaudhary, Tarika Tripathi, Shaunak Pandya, Parikshit Tamalia, Kishan Gadhvi, Sanjay Galsar, Hemang Shah and Rajan Thakar are essaying key supporting roles.
Elated on its promotional kick-start, the film���s distributor Rakesh Sippy (Raksha Entertainment) says ���Marketing has become an integral part of film business and am glad that the producers of Duniyadari (Gujarati) have realized the importance of the same and starting the marketing like a Big Bollywood film 2 months prior to release. Am glad to be associated with the distribution of such a film.���
He further adds ���The publicity of the film is very youth oriented and the youngsters are bound to get attracted by the same. The trailer shows that it is a complete film for youngsters along with family values. It definitely has a super cool retro look which seems like a first for Gujarati films!���
'Duniyadari' is produced by Tajdar Amrohi of Kamal Amrohi Pictures and Riyaz Balooch of Worldwide Motion Pictures and is scheduled to release in February 2017.
